summary: Allows all housecarls full use of player homes including using equipment and sleeping.
descriptionHtml:
This plug-in allows Housecarls full use of your home instead of being confined to a couple of chairs.  This works for:
Argis the Bulwark in Markarth
Calder in Windhelm
Iona in Riften
Jordis the sword maiden in Solitude, and
Lydia in Whiterun
Your housecarls will eat, sleep, cook, and make full use of any equipment on hand including equipment added by other mods.

This mod WILL conflict with any other Housecarl mods. If you notice other conflicts please COMMENT, if you use this and like it please ENDORSE.

To Install:
Add zFreeRoamHC to C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

To Uninstall:
Delete zFreeRoamHC from C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data



My Other Mods:
Nightingale Tarn
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11580
Nightingale Dock
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11563
author: reggert
